info.name: Mastodon Blacklead Theme
info.description: A distraction-free/minimalist Mastodon theme that emphasizes the display of post content over account information. Low contrast, low saturation, dark gray background. Updated for Mastodon v3.3.0. Functions best over vanilla Mastodon's dark theme. The low contrast might not work for everyone.
info.additionalInfo:
The code is based on Mastodon Flat CSS (https://github.com/trwnh/mastodon-flat-css ) and Frederikam's deep dark theme (https://gist.github.com/Frederikam/b0ab4e67df01938ab7d7a589ca3987f1 ).

For latest version, see https://gist.github.com/mast-range/1893eb8a24f40f082b49df0f1fa3fc0c
